alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 08 at 2:27PM PST until February 10 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM PST FRIDAY FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase during Thursday afternoon and should peak during the evening and overnight hours before decreasing Friday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
